name: @xml-conformance-suite/js
description: A conformance suite for tools that parse XML.
author: Louis-Dominique Dubeau <ldd@lddubeau.com>

scripts.copy-bin: mkdir -p build/dist && cp -rp bin build/dist/ && sed -i -e's;../src/cli/;../cli/;g' build/dist/bin/*
scripts.build: npm run generate-build-info && npm run tsc && npm run copy-bin && npm run clean-package && npm run add-modules
scripts.lint: tslint -p src && tslint -p test && eslint bin/* "test/**/*.js" && npmPkgJsonLint ./package.json
scripts.self:pack: npm run test && cd build/dist/ && (packname=`npm pack --silent`; mv $packname ..; echo $packname)
